titles.title: Expressing support for designation of December 12, 2012, as Foster Children's Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 5/16/2012--Introduced. Supports the designation of Foster Children's Day in the United States to recognize the unique needs an experiences of foster children and to provide an opportunity for federal, state, and local government, private organizations, and the general public to engage in charitable efforts which acknowledge that these foster children are important and loved.
